titles.title: Expressing the gratitude of the House of Representatives for the service of M. Pope Barrow, Jr.

action.text: Mr. Dingell asked unanimous consent to consider as introduced.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 635.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 7/13/2009--Passed House without amendment. Expresses the gratitude of the House of Representatives to: (1) M. Pope Barrow, Jr., for his 40 years of service to the House; and (2) the Office of the Legislative Counsel for its more than 90 years of assistance in the drafting of legislation considered by the House.
